lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kun tu

mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag

pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dgu kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dgu kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag

kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin

tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ ting nge 'dzin kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam

par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ ting nge 'dzin kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /

thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir

ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /

thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu

rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab

'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du thams cad shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o//

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ thams cad shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kun tu

mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas

pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad
du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha'

yas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// //
shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa'o// bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gang de ltar rtogs pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/ pha rol gyi

'gram mam/ gnyis kyi dbus na gnas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/ pha rol gyi 'gram mam/ gnyis ka'i dbus na gnas shing shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la

pa'i tshul du 'du shes su bgyid pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor legs so legs so//

rab 'byor de ni du yang chags pa yin/ mtshan mar yang chags pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma pa/ pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na du yang chags shing mtshan mar

yang chags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la du 'dzin tam mtshan mar 'dzin na de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la dang mtshan mar 'dzin cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo // rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems

dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar 'dzin cing de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar bzung nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed na de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed cing shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo // rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang de ltar legs par bshad cing legs par bstan la chags pa dang ma chags pa de dag kyang mchis pa ngo mtshar che'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di

skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa ni gang yin ma chags pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa

pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas/ gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du shes stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du byed stong pa

zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes

na chags pa'o// lce stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lus stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sgra stong pa zhes

bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dri stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ro stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// reg stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chos stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gi

rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar

'du shes na chags pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//

rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong

pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa

zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sa'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chu'i khams stong pa zhes bya

bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rlung gi khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// nam mkha'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i

khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ma rig pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//

dang gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// skye mched drug stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes

na chags pa'o// sred pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// len pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// srid pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// skye ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rga

shi stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar

'du shes na chags pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes

na chags pa'o// nang stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya

par 'du shes na chags pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dor ba pa stong

pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar

'du shes na chags pa'o// pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dngos po

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang

pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dbang po rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// stobs rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na

chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// bsam gtan rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags

pa'o// tshad pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//

mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams

stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'jigs pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// byams pa chen po stong pa zhes bya

bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// snying rje chen po stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du

shes na chags pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//

rang byang chub stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i

bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas/ 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i tshes

zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// de ltar byung pa'i chos rnams la de ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo

pa'i tshul du sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ba nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// phyi nang

stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// 'dus ma byas

stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dor ba pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod na

chags pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dngos po pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la

spyod na chags pa'o// dbang po rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i
bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// bsam gtan rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// tshad pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam

par thar pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod na chags pa'o// mngon par

shes pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// 'jigs pa rnams la spyod na chags

pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// byams pa chen po la spyod na chags pa'o// snying rje chen po la spyod na chags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs

pa'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rang byang chub la spyod na chags pa'o// lam

gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa

rnams kyi chags pa pa gang zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs la gzugs zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do// tshor ba la

tshor ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do// 'du shes la 'du shes zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do// 'du byed la 'du byed ces bya bar 'du shes pa do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do// 'das pa'i

chos rnams la 'das pa'i tshes zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do// de ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa do// tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no// 'di la sbyin pa zhig sbyin no// sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin no zhe 'am/

bdag gis ni tshul khrims shig bsrung ngo // tshul khrims 'di lta bu zhig bsrung ngo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni bzod pa zhig bsgom mo// bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni brtson 'grus shig brtsam mo// brtson 'grus 'di

lta bu zhig brtsam mo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go/ bsam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par gzhag go zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni shes rab cig bsgom mo/ shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe 'am/ bdag

gis ni bsod nams shig bskyed do// bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed do// bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed do// bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par chud par bya'o// bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par

bya'o// bdag gis ni sems can yongs su smyin par bya'o zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs

mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam

pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong

pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir cing rgyu ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag

ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chags pa pa dag go/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor

rnam grangs gang gis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags par 'gyur ba yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka

'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du

shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /

phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes

pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'du shes

pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes

pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / dbang po rnams su 'du shes pa dang / stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byang chub

kyi yan lag rnams su 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan rnams su 'du shes pa dang / tshad pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang /

gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa

dang / smon pa med par 'du shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams su 'du shes pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang /
'jigs pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byams pa chen por 'du shes pa dang / snying rje chen por 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

brgyad du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su 'du shes par gyur te/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag tu 'du shes nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas bla na pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag ni/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste/ chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na/

chags pa pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni kau shi ka gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'du shes kyi rang bzhin

yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rna ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo

bar nus so// sna'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lce'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lus kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// yid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// gzugs kyi rang bzhin

yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sgra'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dri'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// ro'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// reg gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// chos

kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar

nus so// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// gi 'dus te reg

pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus

so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rna

ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar

nus so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar

nus so// chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su
bsngo bar nus so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// ma rig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so//

rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// skye mched drug gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so//

tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sred pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// len pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// srid pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// skye ba'i rang bzhin yongs su

bsngo bar nus so// rga shi'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// stong pa nyid

stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo

bar nus so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar

nus so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rang gi

mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi

rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so//

byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so//

bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// tshad pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rnam

par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

pa dang / smon pa pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang

bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin

yongs su bsngo bar nus so// byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus

so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// dgra bcom

pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs

su bsngo bar nus so// kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzhan zhig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam/ yang dag par bskul lam/ yang dag par spro ba bskyed

dam/ yang dag par dga' bar bya na/ yang dag par rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o// yang dag par bskul bar bya'o// yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o// yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de yang

ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag

ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang /

phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong

pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid

la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par

'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

la sbyong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/

bdag ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong

pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par

'gyur ba dang / pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid la spyod

do// zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni

dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / yang

dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par

rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dbang po rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur

ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam

yan lag brgyad pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan

rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshad pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / gzugs

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad

la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par

'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par

'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar

rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni de

bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'jigs pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par

rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byams pa chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen

po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni snying rje chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par

rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lan cig

phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod

pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la

spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par

'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par bskul bar bya/ yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya/ yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o// yang dag par bskul bar bya'o// yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o// yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de yang dag par bstan pa de dang yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag

par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ba des gzhan yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe/ rma 'byung bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas
kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// // shes rab kyi

pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so// zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa legs so legs so// rab 'byor de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba dag bstan par byas/ de dag shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das

de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de srid du chags pa'o// gang yang 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang

da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan

mar yid la byed cing / yid la byas nas bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang de ma

yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o//

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni

zab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas/ mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar nus so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs

ma rgyas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do// rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no//

gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po rang bzhin ma yin pa ma byas pa mngon par 'du ma byas

pa/ shes na chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma thos ma rtogs rnam par ma shes/ mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis khyab pa'o//

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so// gzugs kyis ma shes so// tshor bas ma shes so// 'du shes kyis ma shes so// 'du byed kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pas ma
shes so// gis ma shes so// rna bas ma shes so// snas ma shes so// lces ma shes so// lus kyis ma shes so// yid kyis ma shes so// gzugs kyis ma shes so// sgras ma shes so// dris ma shes so// ros

ma shes so// reg gis ma shes so// chos kyis ma shes so// gi rnam par shes pas ma shes so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// sna'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// lce'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so//

lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so// yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so// gi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg

pas ma shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// sna'i

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// sa'i
khams kyis ma shes so// chu'i khams kyis ma shes so// khams kyis ma shes so// rlung gi khams kyis ma shes so// nam mkha'i khams kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma shes so// ma rig

pas ma shes so// 'du byed kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pas ma shes so// dang gzugs kyis ma shes so// skye mched drug gis ma shes so// reg pas ma shes so// tshor bas ma shes so// sred pas ma shes so//

len pas ma shes so// srid pas ma shes so// skye bas ma shes so// rga shis ma shes so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so//

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid

kyis ma shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so//

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma

shes so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis

ma shes so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma shes so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma shes so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma shes so// dbang po rnams kyis ma shes so// stobs rnams

kyis ma shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma shes so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma shes so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma shes so// bsam gtan rnams kyis ma shes so// tshad pa rnams kyis

ma shes so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis ma shes so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma shes so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan

ma pa dang / smon pa pas ma shes so// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ma shes so//

'jigs pa rnams kyis ma shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma shes so// byams pa chen pos ma shes so// snying rje chen pos ma shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyis ma shes so// rgyun tu zhugs

pa'i 'bras bus ma shes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rang byang chub kyis ma shes so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma shes
so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu bdun no// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das

la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs
pa dang / tshor ba pa dang / 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa pa dang / pa dang / rna ba pa dang / sna pa dang / lce pa dang /
lus pa dang / yid pa dang / gzugs pa dang / sgra pa dang / dri pa dang / ro pa dang / reg pa dang / chos pa dang / gi rnam par shes pa
pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa
dang / gi 'dus te reg pa pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa dang / yid
kyi 'dus te reg pa pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang /
lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa dang / sa'i khams pa dang / chu'i
khams pa dang / khams pa dang / rlung gi khams pa dang / nam mkha'i khams pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams pa dang / ma rig pa
pa dang / 'du byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa pa dang / dang gzugs pa dang / skye mched drug pa dang / reg pa pa dang / tshor ba pa dang / sred pa pa dang /
len pa pa dang / srid pa pa dang / skye ba pa dang / rga shi pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / nang stong pa nyid pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid
pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid pa dang / 'dus ma
byas stong pa nyid pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa dang / chos
thams cad stong pa nyid pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / pa stong pa nyid pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / dngos po
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / dren pa nye bar gzhag pa pa dang / yang dag par spong ba pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa dang / dbang po pa dang / stobs pa dang / byang chub
kyi yan lag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa pa dang / bsam gtan pa dang / tshad pa pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa pa dang / mngon par shes
pa pa dang / ting nge 'dzin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa dang / 'jigs pa pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa pa dang / byams pa
chen po pa dang / snying rje chen po pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu pa dang / phyir 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid pa dang / rang byang chub pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal

te gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs

sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par

'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs do// gal te tshor ba la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor brtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am

sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar

spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba do// gal

te 'du shes la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar

spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag ba 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du shes do// gal te 'du byed la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed pa de zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal

te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang

rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du byed do// gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal

te rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa do// gal te la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bdag

ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sdug ces bya ba 'am sdug ces bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am

bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i do// gal te rna ba la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya

bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar spyod na shes

bar 'du shes pa do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su 'grib/ bstan kyang 'phel/ ma bstan kyang 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su 'grib/ bstan kyang 'phel ma bstan kyang

'phel lo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i legs pa 'am ma lags pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' ni legs pa

brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa do// nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa do// nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba do// nyes pa brjod kyang 'phel ba do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes

bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba do// nyes pa brjod kyang 'grib pa do// legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba do// nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba do// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos

nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin ma bstan kyang de bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe/ zhum pa dang g.yeng

bar 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par bgyid cing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa ste/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// 'du shes ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so//

rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni ma mchis so// rna ba ma mchis so// sna ma mchis so// lce ma mchis so// lus ma mchis so// yid ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so// sgra ma mchis so//

dri ma mchis so// ro ma mchis so// reg ma mchis so// chos ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par

shes pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma

mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te

reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// yid

kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni sa'i khams ma mchis so// chu'i khams ma mchis so// khams ma mchis so// rlung gi khams ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so// rnam par shes

pa'i khams ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni ma rig pa ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// dang gzugs ma mchis so// skye mched drug ma mchis so// reg pa ma mchis so// tshor

ba ma mchis so// sred pa ma mchis so// len pa ma mchis so// srid pa ma mchis so// skye ba ma mchis so// rga shi ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// nam

mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus byas

stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma

mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so//

dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so// dbang po rnams ma mchis so//
stobs rnams ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so// tshad pa

rnams ma mchis so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan

ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so//

'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so// byams pa chen po ma mchis so// snying rje chen po ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni

rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so// rang byang chub ma mchis so// bla na pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di

'tshal ba de dag ni/ phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos/ 'bad par mos/ rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can

rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing / yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/

go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdegs par 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po gang sems can rnams kyi don du bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos

rnams kyi slad du/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ dpa' bo bsam gyis khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom

ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam 'bras kyi shing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du

de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa

yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am 'gang ba gda'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ de bzhin du gal te phyogs

bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam til gyi zhing bzhin

du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa yongs su

mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am 'gang bar gda' 'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ bdag 'di

skad du sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal pa de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags

zhes mchi'o// de nas dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa yang la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po yang yod/

rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ dgra bcom

pa nyid kyang yod// rang byang chub kyang yod/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba yang yod/ dgra bcom pa yang yod/ rang sangs
rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos dkon mchog kyang yod/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod

chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab

'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/ de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

la bslab par sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bag bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la

bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras

pa btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan

pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ro// gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/ de la ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams

kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par sems pa ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar 'grub

cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smyig rgyu dang / lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / yor dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab

par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni nus so// smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab

par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro// kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab

par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni nus so// smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab

par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam

gyis khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni nus so// smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces

smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ lam lta bu'i chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta

bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs su shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/
lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed/

smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag
gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed// yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed/

dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed// sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom

sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed pa yin// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems
su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems

su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems
su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ yor

la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed// dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems

su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba rlom sems su byed/ tshor bas rlom sems su byed/ tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ tshor ba la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis
rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la

rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan
gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su

byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su

byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes rlom sems su byed/ 'du shes kyis rlom sems su byed/ 'du shes bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ 'du shes la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/
lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/

sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra
brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes

rlom sems su byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la
rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed rlom sems su byed/ 'du byed kyis rlom sems su byed/ 'du byed bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ 'du byed la rlom sems
su byed na// de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su

byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la

rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byad/

sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems su byed/ yor gyis rlom sems su byed/ yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su

byed/ yor la rlom sems su byed do// de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su

po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su byed/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dngos po pa
stong pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/

sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/

smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su byed do// de yor rlom sems

dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sprul pa la rlom

sems su byed do// kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rlom sems su byed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed/ ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems su byed na/ de lam rlom sems su byed/ lam gyis rlom sems su byed/ lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ lam la

rlom sems su byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyus rlom

sems su byed/ smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su byed/ sgra
