ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad

pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad pa'i

phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad

do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu

pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad

pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tshad pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do//

sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag tshad pa'i phyir/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa brgyad tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs

kyi sgo tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'jigs pa bzhi tshad

pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po tshad pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa tshad do// // shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu drug pa// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar

spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te 'du byed zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce zab ces bya bar spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs zab/

ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te ro zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par

shes pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya

bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal

te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pha la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha tu

phyin pa la spyod do// gal te khams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams zab

ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dang gzugs zab ces bya bar

spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched drug zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te tshor ba zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te len pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te srid pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi zab ces bya bar spyod

na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te nang stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te phyi stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid

zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid zab ces

bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha

tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal

te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa

nye bar gzhag pa rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi

rkang pa rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

do// gal te tshad pa rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'jigs pa bzhi zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par

rig pa bzhi zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad zab ces bya

bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab ces bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no//

tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin

pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ma yin no// rna ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba ma yin no// sna'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sna ma yin no// lce'i zab pa nyid gang yin

pa de ni/ lce ma yin no// lus kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lus ma yin no// yid kyi thab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no// sgra'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa

de ni/ sgra ma yin no// dri'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dri ma yin no// ro'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ro ma yin no// reg gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ reg ma yin no// chos kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos ma yin no//

gi rnam phar shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin

pa de ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no//

yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// gi 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid

gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus

te reg pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// gi 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no//

sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chu'i khams ma yin no// khams kyi zab pa nyid

gang yin pa de ni/ khams ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par shes

pa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin no// rnam

par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// dang gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug

ma yin no// reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ reg pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma yin no// len pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa

de ni/ len pa ma yin no// srid pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ srid pa ma yin no// skye ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid

gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin

pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin no//

phyi stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong

pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa

de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang

yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa

stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa

nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang

yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po rnams ma yin no// stobs rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams

kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid

gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// tshad pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshad pa rnams ma yin no//

gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no// mthar

kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i zab pa nyid gang

yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi zab pa

nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de

bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no// 'jigs pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin no//

snying rje chen po'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi zab

pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du

byed gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gting dpag dka'

zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid gting

dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te

reg gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi rnam par shes pa gting dpag

dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka'

zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes

bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus te reg pa gting

dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka'

zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya

bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag

dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod do// gal te khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te nam mkha'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal

te ma rig pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa gting

dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dang gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched drug gting dpag dka' zhes

bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te len pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te srid pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi gting

dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa la spyod do// gal te brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te

phyi stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka'

zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya

bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka'

zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar

mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar

spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar

spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar

spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshad pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad gting dpag dka'

zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa'i

sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'jigs pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal

te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin no// 'du

byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ ma yin no// rna ba'i gting

dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba ma yin no// sna'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sna ma yin no// lce'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lce ma yin no// lus kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa

de ni/ lus ma yin no// yid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no// sgra'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sgra ma yin no// dri'i gting

dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dri ma yin no// ro'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ ro ma yin no// reg gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ reg ma yin no// chos kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ chos ma yin no//

gi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i gting

dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de

ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// gi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gi 'dus te

reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus

te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba

gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin

no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lus

kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sa'i khams kyi gting dpag dka'
ba gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ chu'i khams ma yin no// khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ khams ma yin no//
rlung gi khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams
kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi gting dpag dka'
ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// dang gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dang gzugs ma yin

no// skye mched drug gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug ma yin no// reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ reg pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ tshor

ba ma yin no// sred pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma yin no// len pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ len pa ma yin no// srid pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ srid

pa ma yin no// skye ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de

ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang

yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ nang

stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi

gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa

de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa

nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma pa

stong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos

thams cad stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//
pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa

nye bar gzhag pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i

gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ma yin no// dbang po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po ma yin no// stobs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ stobs ma yin no//

byang chub kyi yan lag gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan ma yin no/ tshad pa'i gting
dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ tshad pa ma yin no// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi

gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no//

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa'i gting

dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo ma yin
no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no// 'jigs pa bzhi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no//

so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad

kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag

dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba tshad do

zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te rna ba tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te

gzugs tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te

chos tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi rnam par shes pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa

tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad do

zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad do

zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus te reg pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad do zhes bya

bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad do zhes bya bar

spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod

na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

ba tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te khams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal

te rlung gi khams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i

khams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dang gzugs tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched drug tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor

ba tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te len pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te srid pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te

rga shi tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal

te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te phyi stong

pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa

nyid stong pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad

do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad

do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma pa stong

pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba pa stong pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad

do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te pa stong pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po pa stong pa nyid

tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong

ba rnams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams

tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshad

do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa

rnams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshad pa rnams tshad do

zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad tshad

do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'jigs pa bzhi tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal

te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//

gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad do zhes bya bar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// //
